name: Tea Tree Healing Balm
description:
My healing balm is made with 100% Tea Tree Essential Oil and all natural ingredients including Mango Butter, Cocoa Butter, Avocado Oil and Jojoba Oil.

This balm is concentrated. A little goes a long way! Suggested use is on dry areas of the skin, itchy spots, bug bites, burns, etc.

Handcrafted from scratch and made by me.

Available in a tube, tin or jar. 

INFORMATION ONLY: Tea Tree oil contains constituents called terpenoids, which have been found to have natural antiseptic, anti-fungal and anti-viral properties. An abundance of information is on the internet. Avoid use on lips and near eyes. Always use common sense when using any product -- stop use if irritation develops.

Ingredients: Tea Tree Essential Oil, Beeswax, Mango Butter, Cocoa Butter, Avocado Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Castor Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil and Vitamin E Oil.
